name: Always Beta: Memetic Branding in the Digital Age.
description: Love + Money's ConFig 2022 talk about Atomic Design (and how we need to push it further), Brands as Memes (and how that links back to Charles Darwin), and our core philosophy, Always Beta (and why it's important to identify what's non-negotiable, so you can let go of everything else.)
